children.title: Display a simple map
children.description: This sample shows how to display a simple map. Double left/right click to zoom in/out, hold Shift key to track zoom in, hold Alt key to rotate.

children.description: This sample shows how to add an InMemoryMarkerOverlay and set its styles. Mouse hover to show its tooltip.

children.description: This sample shows how to drag a marker around.

children.description: This sample shows how to drag to copy a new marker and drag around. (Shift + Drag to copy a marker on the map.)

children.description: This sample shows how to add a mouse coordinate map tool on the bottom right.

children.description: This sample shows how to change the default logo map tool.

children.title: Add a pan zoom bar
children.description:
This sample shows how to add a pan zoom bar on the map.

        Tips: A level number displays next to the drag handler on the bar during dragging when tracking level is enabled.
